name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: What once was a peaceful realm, has become a calamity, thanks to [color=#771f6c][i]Jörmungandr...[/i][/color]

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: He has laid his deadly thorns all over this once beautiful land, be cautious or they’ll injure you!

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: If you’re feeling weary, this Apple Tree may help to recover your strength so you can battle on

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: [color=#771f6c][i]Jörmungandr’s Den[/i][/color] lies behind the thorn protected door, you’ll need to gather all 3 keys before you may challenge him

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: Find them all and return here to prepare for the ensuing battle
